Package com.microsoft.azure.documentdb

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HashGenerator
    HashGenerator interface to be implemented for computing the hash used in the hashing algorithm
    PartitionKeyExtractor
    PartitionKeyExtractor interface is used for getting the partition key from a document
    PartitionResolver
    This is an interface to be implemented for partitioning scenarios and register it at the document client level
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessCondition
    Represents a set of access conditions to be used for operations against DocumentDB.
    Attachment
    Represents a document attachment.
    Conflict
    Represents a conflict in the version of a particular resource.
    ConnectionPolicy
    Represents the Connection policy associated with a DocumentClient.
    ConsistencyPolicy
    ConsistencyPolicy
    Database
    Represents a Database.
    DatabaseAccount
    The database account information.
    Document
    Represents a document.
    DocumentClient
    Provides a client-side logical representation of the Azure DocumentDB service.
    DocumentCollection
    Represents a document collection.
    Error
    Encapsulates error related details.
    ExcludedPath  
    FeedOptions
    Specifies the options associated with feed methods (enumeration operations).
    FeedResponse<T extends Resource>
    Template class used by feed methods (enumeration operations).
    HashIndex  
    HashPartitionResolver
    HashPartitionResolver implements partitioning based on the value of a hash function, allowing you to evenly distribute requests and data across a number of partitions by implementing PartitionResolver interface.
    IncludedPath  
    Index  
    IndexingPolicy
    Represents the indexing policy configuration for a collection.
    MediaOptions
    Options used with attachment content (aka media) creation.
    MediaResponse
    Response associated with retrieving attachment content.
    Offer
    Represents the offer for a resource (collection).
    Permission
    Represents a per-User Permission to access a specific resource e.g.
    QueryIterable<T extends Resource>
    The template class for iterable resources.
    Range<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>  
    RangeIndex  
    RangePartitionResolver<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    RangePartitionResolver implements partitioning based on the ranges, allowing you to distribute requests and data across a number of partitions by implementing PartitionResolver interface.
    RequestOptions
    Encapsulates options that can be specified for a request issued to the Azure DocumentDB service.
    Resource
    Resource type.
    ResourceResponse<T extends Resource>
    Represents the service response to a request made from DocumentClient.
    SpatialIndex  
    SqlParameter  
    SqlParameterCollection  
    SqlQuerySpec  
    StoredProcedure
    Represents a stored procedure.
    StoredProcedureResponse
    Represents the response returned from a stored procedure.
    Trigger
    Represents a trigger.
    User
    Represents a database user.
    UserDefinedFunction
    Represents a user defined function.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AccessConditionType
    Specifies the set of access condition types that can be used for operations.
    ConnectionMode
    Represents the connection mode to be used by the client Direct and Gateway connectivity modes are supported.
    ConsistencyLevel
    Represents the consistency levels supported for DocumentDB client operations.
    DataType  
    IndexingDirective
    Specifies whether or not the resource is to be indexed.
    IndexingMode
    Specifies the supported indexing modes.
    IndexKind  
    MediaReadMode
    Represents the mode for use with downloading attachment content (aka media).
    PermissionMode
    Enumeration specifying applicability of permission.
    TriggerOperation
    Specifies the operations on which a trigger should be executed.
    TriggerType
    The trigger type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DocumentClientException
    The base class for Azure DocumentDB client exceptions.
